text: Hungry Howie's wins the gluten free pizza challenge! I am never happy w any of the other gf pizzas i receive, the one from your store was awesome! Really good quality cheese, actually extra ingredients perfectly cooked and flavorful. I will be ordering from this store exclusively, so good!

text: So I have given this place two different chances and it's been a let down. The first time they burnt my pepperoni pizza. Second time I got their supreme and it was SO wet that it warped the cardboard box and I had to put the pizza in the oven and it took forever to dry it up and it was still basically a floppy soggy mess.

name: Cynthia Guillen
text: It's a good place to get a quick snack. Prices are the same as other places so it's no longer cheaper. However, one of the only places with flavored crusts. The people are pretty cool.

name: Todd Shiber
text: Alright pizza. It was a nice change from the usual places I eat. I ordered online, picked up in person. Friendly staff, pizza is alright, I'll try a flavored crust on my next order.

text: After recommendations from people I know that Hungry Howies is awesome, well I give it a big fat ZERO! Bread is rubbery, pizza is burnt, delivery took 42min, pizza is not hot. SO DISAPPOINTED! Little Caesars kicks Hungry Howies rear any day of the week! I am glad delivery was free and that I did not tip because this is awful!
